
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define pri(x) printf("%d",x)
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pll(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define sstr(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pstr(s) printf("%s",s)
#define nl printf("\n")
#define ll long long int
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair

int Z[400005];
char a[400005];
char b[400005];

void z(char a[]) {
    int n = strlen(a);
    Z[0]=-1;
    int l,r;
    l = r = 0;
    for(int i=1;i<n;++i) {
	if(i>r) {
	    l = r = i;
	    while(r<n && a[r]==a[r-l]) {
		r++;
	    }
	    r--;
	    Z[i] = r-l+1;
	}
	else {
	    int k = i-l;
	    if(Z[k] < r-i+1) {
		Z[i] = Z[k];
	    }
	    else {
		l = i;
		while(r<n && a[r]==a[r-l]) {
		    r++;
		}
		r--;
		Z[i] = r-l+1;
	    }
	}
    }
  //  for(int i=0;i<n;++i) {
//	cout<<Z[i]<<" ";
//    }
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    si(t);
    while(t--) {
	memset(Z,0,sizeof(Z));
	int n,m,k;
	si(n); si(m); si(k);
	sstr(b);
	sstr(a);
	int l = strlen(a), K = strlen(b);
	int x = strlen(a);
	a[l] = 'X';
	l++;
	for(int i=0;i<K;++i,++l) {
	    a[l] = b[i];
	}
	a[l] = '\0';
	z(a);
	int ans = 0;
	for(int i=x+1;i<l;++i) {
	    if(Z[i]>=k) {
		ans++;
	    }
	}
	if(ans == 0) {
	    pri(-1); nl;
	    continue;
	}
	pri(ans); nl;
    }
    return 0;
}
